ROOT.name: Napoleon
ROOT.desc: Follow in the footsteps of Napoleon to conquer the known world of 1796!
ROOT.intro: Napoleon Bonaparte was one of the greatest generals in the history of the world. This poor Corsican officer proved that the great kings of Europe could be dethroned by a common man. Although reviled as an evil genius by many, when his armies swarmed across Europe, they left behind them the same republican ideals that had sparked the French Revolution. Follow in his footsteps or forge your own path as you attempt to CONQUER THE WORLD!
ROOT.victory_conditions: Through conquest, coercion, and shrewd dealing, gain control over the entire world.

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Warfare
STYLE.description: The enemy has taken several of your cities. Their morale is not very high, however if enough of their men are eliminated they will likely retreat.

STYLE.title: Conquest
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) or hold out for $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: You are being invaded by a treacherous neighbor. Take the enemy capital(s) or hold off their assault for $NUM0 minutes to force them to withdraw.

STYLE.title: Conquest
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Field Battle
STYLE.description: Your army is approaching the enemy's army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.

STYLE.title: Supply Train
STYLE.description: The enemy army has decided that they cannot win this battle and are fleeing with all of their supplies. Destroy their Supply Wagons to gain these supplies for yourself, but be careful; the enemy is not totally helpless. Keep at least one of your units alive until the timer runs out to achieve victory.

STYLE.title: Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Eliminate all enemy Generals or control 70% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy's army is tied up elsewhere, so they have hired mercenaries. These mercenaries can survive without a City and they suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. And beware--they will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the mercenaries!

STYLE.title: Melee
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital or defeat them by capturing territory in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The barbarians in this territory are hostile and must be eliminated. Defeat them by capturing their capitals or capturing most of their territory in $NUM0 minutes.

STYLE.title: Tactics
STYLE.objective: Find and capture the enemy's capital.
STYLE.description: Expecting no resistance to your invasion, no support troops were included in your expeditionary force. A fortified city has been encountered, however, and must be eliminated.

STYLE.title: Nomad
STYLE.description: You have successfully established a new settlement but several nomadic tribes also claim this territory. Eliminate them in order to protect your people.
STYLE.victory_text: You have defeated all of the nomad tribes.
STYLE.defeat_text: You were unable to defeat all of the nomad tribes.

STYLE.title: Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Eliminate all enemy Generals or control 70% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy's army is tied up elsewhere, so they have hired mercenaries. These mercenaries can survive without a City and they suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. And beware--they will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the mercenaries.

STYLE.title: Field Battle
STYLE.description: Your army is approaching the enemy's army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.

STYLE.title: Battle of Stockholm
STYLE.description: Your troops may be able to tolerate the harsh winter climate of this region. The weather, however, makes farming impossible. Fortunately the seas are full of Fish, which you will have to rely on for Food.

STYLE.title: Battle of Montenotte #ICON108
STYLE.description: Napoleon has arrived near the city of Montenotte to begin his first command. Using limited resource income from the Directorate, you will have to try to capture the city of Montenotte. Your gather rate for all resources will incrase for each enemy unit you kill, and decrease for each unit that you lose.

STYLE.title: The Ruins of Montenotte
STYLE.description: The Papal States have recently conquered this region from the Austrians and Sardinians. They have left Montenotte and other towns in ruins. There are rumors of an abandoned Austrian garrison that is still in the area that might be able to assist you if you can find their leader Commander Schwarzenberg.

STYLE.title: Transylvania
STYLE.description: A Small City is being terrorized by a castle across the river. We will have to destroy the castle and eliminate the enemy forces in order to safeguard the innocent Citizens.

STYLE.title: Battle of Copenhagen
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Battle of Rome
STYLE.description: Any other European leader would be afraid to march his army towards the Vatican. You, however, have realized how crucial this historic land is to the conquest of Europe, and so you have sent your army there to pacify the region.

STYLE.title: Battle of Rome
STYLE.description: Any other European leader would be afraid to march his army towards the Vatican. You, however, have realized how crucial this historic land is to the conquest of Europe, and so you have sent your army there to pacify the region.

STYLE.title: Battle of Ulm
STYLE.description: Your army has reached the vast Black Forest. You will have to find your way through the maze of trees in order to locate and then destroy the enemy.

STYLE.title: Battle for Portugal
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Battle of Istanbul
STYLE.description: The enemy has much power in this region. You will find it a hard battle to win. Capture enemy cities in order to gain bonuses which will help you win.

STYLE.title: Battle of Ankara
STYLE.description: The enemy has much power in this region. You will find it a hard battle to win. Capture enemy cities in order to gain bonuses which will help you win.

STYLE.title: Royalist Battle
STYLE.description: Your army is approaching the enemy's army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their buildings in order to win.

STYLE.title: Royalist Revolt
STYLE.description: Your enemy has launched a surprise attack on this territory. Hold off the attackers and defend your capital to achieve victory.

STYLE.title: Battle of Austerlitz #ICON108
STYLE.description: The lines of battle have been drawn. You must take command of the battle and defeat the enemy. The Archduke Charles, brother of Emperor Franz I, has brought his own army to battle.

STYLE.title: Battle of Austerlitz #ICON108
STYLE.description: The lines of battle have been drawn. You must take command of the battle and defeat the enemy. The Archduke Charles, brother of Emperor Franz I, has brought his own army to battle.

STYLE.title: Battle of Leipzig #ICON108
STYLE.description: Your army has been forced into confrontation near the town of Leipzig. Enemy reinforcements from many different countries have been spotted heading this way. This gigantic encounter is surely a "battle of nations" if ever there was one. Overcome their superior numbers with your military prowess.

STYLE.title: Battle of Jena #ICON108
STYLE.description: Marshal Lannes has forced a confrontation with General Hohenloe near the town of Jena. You arrive with reinforcements double the size of the enemy army. To exploit this advantage, you must force the engagement onto open field and overcome the chaotic state your army is in.

STYLE.title: Battle of Eylau #ICON108
STYLE.description: The Russian army has been spotted near the Prussian village of Eylau. Even though there is a raging snowstorm you have to take the offensive. Be wary, a Prussian army is known to be in the area.

STYLE.title: Battle of Wagram #ICON108
STYLE.description: After easily taking the Austrian capital of Vienna, Napoleon has landed on the other side of the Danube River from the capital city.

STYLE.title: Journey to Acre #ICON108
STYLE.description: Seeking a great victory, Napoleon has come to Syria. You have a small army, but you have brought many Spies with you in order to bribe enemy units. Capture the enemy capital to win.

STYLE.title: Battle of Mantua #ICON108
STYLE.objective: Capture and hold the enemy capital.
STYLE.description: As the main Austrian stronghold in Italy, the Capital of Mantua will not be easy to take. We will have a tough time assaulting it directly. We should instead concentrate on expanding elsewhere and destroying other Austrian settlements until we have a large enough force to assault Mantua.

STYLE.title: The Siege of Malta #ICON108
STYLE.description: While on his way to Egypt, Napoleon stops at the island of Malta. The Knights of Malta have fortified their island and have not lost it in 500 years. Can you succeed where others have failed?

STYLE.title: Battle of Lodi #ICON108
STYLE.objective: Capture and hold the enemy capital.
STYLE.description: The people of Lombardy have already heard great things about you. If you bring a large enough army to Milan, the capital, we might intimidate them into joining our side without a fight. A Persian Merchant is also in the south, if we decide we need some help.

STYLE.title: Battle of Marengo #ICON108
STYLE.objective: Capture and hold the enemy capital.
STYLE.description: The Papal States have recently swooped in and taken over much of this territory. The Milanese refuse to submit and ask for our help. We must protect their capital from falling. A Persian Merchant is also in the north, if we decide we need some help.

STYLE.title: Battle of Friedland #ICON108
STYLE.description: Near the Prussian town of Friedland one of your marshals has spotted a Russian army that has come to the aid of the weakened Prussians. You must hold the advancing Russians until Napoleon arrives with the rest of the French army.

STYLE.title: Battle of Corsica
STYLE.description: Napoleon has returned to his homeland! Great Britain has removed its forces and there is little organized resistance in this territory, but the Corsican patriot, Pascale di Paoli, will not submit quietly.

STYLE.title: Keeping the Peace
STYLE.description: The cities in Burgundy are still unsettled. Men with dangerous ideas and deep pockets threaten the revolution. Hold the area together until things settle down so that you can turn your attention to world affairs. Beware of revolts from disaffected peasants.
STYLE.victory_text: Most of the revolts have subsided. Your power is intact.

STYLE.title: Battle of Lisbon
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Battle of Madrid
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Battle of Brittany
STYLE.description: We must drive the British off of the Continent. Their very existence on the sacred ground of Brittany is an insult to all Frenchmen!

STYLE.title: Battle of Brussels
STYLE.description: The Austrians provide military support to this province but are uneasy about its proximity to France.

STYLE.title: Waterloo #ICON108
STYLE.description: The major powers of Europe have declared Napoleon Bonaparte an outlaw. They have gathered an enormous army to oppose you. The Anglo-Allied army, commanded by the Duke of Wellington, has been spotted near the small village of Waterloo. Crushing him will deal a crucial blow to the European Coalition. Be careful, though, as there is a Prussian army led by Field Marshal Blucher also reported to be in the area.

STYLE.title: Battle of Great Britain
STYLE.description: Great Britain's strength comes from its Royal Navy. We must strike quickly and gain a foothold on their island before they can bring their ships into the fight.

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Bases
STYLE.description: Root out the guerrilla forces in this province to quash all resistance and gain control of the land.

STYLE.title: Battle of the Pyramids #ICON108
STYLE.description: Rather than try to march through the harsh desert into Egypt, you have taken to the sea. Now you must sneak your boats past the Mameluke patrol boats, and land your army near Alexandria.

STYLE.title: March to Moscow #ICON108
STYLE.description: Russia's weather can be more dangerous than her armies. That is why Russian soldiers say their best general is "General Winter." Capture Moscow before your army succumbs to the Russian winter.

STYLE.title: Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Kill all enemy Generals or capture 70% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy's army is tied up elsewhere, so they have hired mercenaries. These mercenaries require no City and suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. They will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the mercenaries.

STYLE.title: Royalist Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Kill all enemy Generals or capture 70% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The royalists have employed mercenaries to harass us. These mercenaries require no City and suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. They will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the mercenaries.

STYLE.title: Nomad
STYLE.description: You have successfully established a new settlement but several nomadic tribes also claim this territory. Eliminate them in order to protect your people.
STYLE.victory_text: You have defeated all of the nomad tribes.
STYLE.defeat_text: You were unable to defeat all of the nomad tribes.

STYLE.title: Low Rations
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) before you run out of rations.
STYLE.description: Your army is in desperate straits. Your enemy has control of 80% of the territory and threatens to drive you into retreat. To make matters worse, rations are running low. You must quickly reclaim some territory and pillage the enemy cities for rations before your army dissolves from hunger. Destroy the enemy Capital(s) to bring the area under your control.

STYLE.title: Low Rations
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) before you run out of rations.
STYLE.description: Your army is in desperate straits. Your enemy has control of 80% of the territory and threatens to drive you into retreat. To make matters worse, rations are running low. You must quickly reclaim some territory and pillage the enemy cities for rations before your army dissolves from hunger. Destroy the enemy Capital(s) to bring the area under your control.

ROOT.INSTRUCTIONS: You are Napoleon Bonaparte, a young officer in the French army. Previously unknown, after your last victory you have been offered a choice of two commands by the Directorate, the council that governs France. Chose wisely, as the one you do not pick will be given to another ambitious officer.The Army of the West - take command of the army based in Paris and attack the French Royalists who have revolted in Burgundy.The Army of Italy - take command of the army based in Marseilles and attack the Sardinians, vassals of the Austrians, in Piedmont.
